question: 大声
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>large</kanji> <kanji>voice</kanji> is probably pretty large. Maybe even annoying, too. That's why this is a <vocabulary>large voice</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>loud voice</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>声</ja> is <ja>ごえ</ja> (rendaku'd version of the reading you know: <ja>こえ</ja>). The reading for <ja>大</ja> is the kun'yomi reading, like with the word <ja>大きい</ja> (<ja>おおきい</ja>). Just imagine a loud voice saying "<ja>おお！</ja>."
